settings.text:
Our collection is available for styling pulls and inquiries! This includes both our online and in-store selections at 119 Newbury Street.

Our fees start at a $30 minimum, with $10 per piece up to a maximum of 10 pieces. If you would like to inquire further on specific pieces, please use the contact form below and we will get back to you promptly!

settings.description: To start the process, leave your name, email, and pieces you would like to pull, and we'll get back to you! You can also visit us in-store at 119 Newbury Street to start the process.
